question_title: Will ALGN's market close price on 2026-02-15 be higher than its market close price on 2026-02-02?
summary: ALGN has Q4 2025 earnings on Feb 4 after market close - the key catalyst between comparison dates. With a track record of beating earnings (3 of 4 quarters), positive analyst sentiment (Buy ratings, $175-200 targets), and leading indicators suggesting strong Q4 case shipments, there's a modest positive bias. However, the stock is down 28% YoY and guidance uncertainty remains. Net assessment: slight edge toward YES given earnings history and analyst sentiment, but not strong conviction.

factors.description: Earnings beat history: ALGN beat 3 of last 4 quarters with avg 3.75% surprise. Zacks notes 10.1% beat last quarter. Leading indicator for Feb 4 results.
Positive analyst sentiment: Avg Buy rating, 12-month targets of $175-179 (current ~$163). Mizuho raised to $200 with Outperform. Multiple firms maintain Buy.
Strong Q4 leading indicators: Evercore notes website traffic data 'broadly exceeds' Street expectations for Q4 case shipments of ~651K.
$200M stock buyback program provides price support, funded from cash on hand.
Stock down 28% YoY - underlying negative trend despite recent stabilization.
Guidance uncertainty: Even with earnings beat, management outlook could disappoint and trigger 'sell the news' reaction.
